titleStmt.title: Die Martis 11. Julij, 1643. Committee appointed by Parliament for the navy and customes Upon the humble complaints of severall poore cardmakers of London, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.R. for Joseph Hunscott,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
An order of the Committee for the navy and customs for the seizure of all playing-cards of foreign make.
Reproductions of the originals in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London (Early English books), and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
